events.message: We received Jane Doe's application for the software engineer position with excitement about her experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
Jane Doe's application has been categorized under Engineering after reviewing her skills in software development and DevOps practices.
Recruiter assigned to Jane Doe's application for the software engineer role to coordinate next steps and interviews.
Initial screening completed successfully. Jane demonstrated solid knowledge in software engineering fundamentals during the phone call.
Jane responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for the technical interview, confirming her availability next week.
Technical interview scheduled with Jane for May 18th at 10 AM UTC focusing on algorithms, system design, and cloud technologies.
